articles.content: LOS ANGELES - It may sound simple: Get the COVID-19 vaccine and now you’re protected from getting sick. But can you still get infected and transmit the coronavirus, which has claimed more than 300,00… [+10002 chars]

articles.title: J&J enrolls about 45,000 participants for late-stage COVID-19 vaccine trial - Reuters
articles.description: Johnson & Johnson said on Thursday it has enrolled about 45,000 participants for the first late-stage trial of its COVID-19 single-dose vaccine candidate and that it expects interim data by late-January.

articles.title: Native Americans Receiving Coronavirus Vaccine After Struggle With Pandemic : Coronavirus Updates - NPR
articles.description: Native Americans have been disproportionately impacted by the coronavirus pandemic and are four times as likely to be hospitalized with COVID-19.
